title: I Tested 10 Agricultural Technologies and Found the BEST for Taiwan Guavas!

subtasks: Select healthy guava sprouts
Plant sprouts by hand, maintaining 5-6.5 feet spacing
Equip drip irrigation system with clean water
Prune and shape trees when 4 months old
Regularly trim grass around trees
Direct nutrients to fruit by cutting branch tops
Wrap guavas in nylon bags for protection
Remove excess branches for one fruit per branch
Manage weed growth around trees
Remove stems and thoroughly wash fruits
Carefully cut guavas using scissors and place in trays
Dig holes for grape vines using mechanical tools
Plant vines, water, and install stakes
Use drip irrigation and fertilize as needed
Tie vines to wires for vertical growth
Harvest grapes by hand in September
Sun-dry grapes for three weeks
Clean grapes using conveyor belts and vacuum technology
Grade and wash raisins
Perform laser sorting for quality control
Use automated machines to pick sprouts
Transport sprouts to processing facility
Use FENT 516 Vario and ESA Lift Carrot Harvester
Transport carrots using FENT 820 and 724 Vario
Load carrots onto trailers with FENT 415 forklift
Use Klaas Jaguar Forage Harvester (nicknamed Doggy Style)
Combine with FEND 412 Vario and ROCRT 1000 conveyor
Shred crop and load into containers for transport
